december 8, 2025
act-decoder: added a new type (<sample layouts>, orange border) to give a rough idea of a zone
act-decoder: added <full layouts> to several zones, and every zone now has at least a <sample layout>
act-tracker: hints are now available when using a dedicated hotkey for the act-decoder
december 1, 2025
act-decoder: added an alternative hotkey, fixed some selection and resetting issues
act-tracker: major rewrite of poe2 guide, major a4 restructuring for upcoming quest rotations
alarm timer: right-click <+> button for easier stopwatch, and they can now be paused/resumed
map-events: notifications can now be individually toggled and customized
minor qol: added new context-menu options for inscribed ultimatums
november 11, 2025
stash-ninja: fixed ultimatum issues
new feature: <chat macros> for fast-travel and custom chat commands
added a <recent changes> section to the updater
map-events: added support for graftblood warnings
item-info: foulborn unique support, updated unique drop-tiers
november 3, 2025
stash-ninja: now uses poe.ninja's currency exchange api, added support for 3.27 tabs and keepers leagues
act-tracker: fixed kinetic fusillade import, fixed a10 bannon/weylam mix-up
item-info: temporarily disabled ilvl affix-info, updated items to 3.27, added support for grafts
fixed inventory pixel-check and vaal street tooltips on 4k setups
october 31, 2025
act-tracker: added support for 3.27 passive trees and gems
hotkeys: added an alternative key to access the menu-widget (F2 by default, can be rebound or disabled)
item-info: added support for 3.27 item bases
horizons tooltip updated to 3.27
october 30, 2025
act-decoder: custom layout images are not supported anymore(/highlight)
act-decoder: added hotkeys for layout selection while moving, added/updated layouts up to a3 sewers
october 27, 2025
act-tracker: major poe1 guide changes (new routes, improved town visits, fewer detours)
october 19, 2025
omni-key is now <capslock> by default and only registered by the tool(/highlight)
hotkeys: <tab> key is now the <widget-key>, and some activations were moved to the <omni-key> instead
replaced the main toolbar with a dynamic menu-widget (long-press <esc> to access it)(/highlight)
seed-explorer feature removed (3rd-party data no longer maintained)
october 8, 2025
clone-frames: added grouping functionality (editing multiple frames at once)
clone-frames: enabled the <infopanel> auto-toggle to hide frames when fullscreen in-game menus are open
item-info: fixed base-stats for expectional items, fixed roll-ranges on global/ilvl scale
omni-key: added <craft of exile 2> link to the context-menu
sanctum/sekhema: improved scanning for crowded pathing
vaal street: fixed ratio-calculator pasting
september 13, 2025
act-tracker: alignment hotkey for pob-tree overlay moved from <space> to <middle mouse>
act-tracker: added an optional hotkey to close in-game tree and tree overlay simultaneously
map-tracker: fixed a tracking bug when dying in a map, then entering abyssal depths
stash-ninja: now poe2 compatible (poe.ninja 2 is still under development, may cause issues)
september 9, 2025
act-tracker: poe2 guide improvements (requires progress reset)
item-info: fixed abyss mods, improved support for essence and abyss mods
map-tracker: added support for tracking abyssal depths
statlas: fixed stats for tagged maps, added a few new images
september 3, 2025
act-tracker: initial support for act 4 and interludes (requires progress reset), added support for 0.3 gems
item-info: updated item bases and mods
updated map-tracker & statlas to support newly-added maps
august 29, 2025
act-tracker: guide updated to 0.3, ends after a3 doryani fight
act-tracker: added new gem-cutting overlay
item-info + map-info updated to 0.3
glhf
august 24, 2025
added a news/announcements feed with notifications for important news regarding bugs, fixes, etc.
vaal street: added poe2 compatibility
august 19, 2025
(hotfix 1) fixed regex strings in gem-setup overlay, anoint calculator now resets after modifying available stock
clone-frames: fixed setup (some clicks weren't registering)
act-tracker: added bullet-points to major lines in the guide, optionals now marked with a plus-sign
act-tracker: major tweaks to poe2 guide, some re-routing, fixed gem regex
sanctum/sekhema: relic manager now auto-adjusts to the in-game relic altar
august 8, 2025
act-tracker: improved routing to skip irrelevant gem-quests and reduce backtracking
act-tracker: timer can now be reset in the first town, added afk auto-pause after 10 seconds
act-tracker: added a <gems> toggle to enable/disable gem-quests, added a gem-pickup configurator to adjust when gems should be picked up
act-tracker: stylistic rewrite of poe1 guide, guide-panel auto hides in lab
act-tracker: added earlier ascension options, skip siosa/lilly if not required (pob)
guide editor received a major redesign
map-tracker: fixed oshabi fight, replaced reflecting mist icon
act-tracker: pob-tree improvements (smoothness, color customization)
map-events: added support for infamous mercenaries
vaal street: added ratio locking
july 7, 2025
map-info: fixed the t17 rare monster map-mod
map-tracker: added starfall crater to trackable side-areas (untested, needs feedback)
new feature: <vaal street> (currency exchange qol, trade logging, balance tracking)
if the updater fails, read the full release notes
fixed act-decoder on multi-monitors, map-info alt-activation on invitations, act-tracker guide-panel unhiding after completion
act-tracker: added per-slot character tracking, increased max slots to 9
map-tracker: added support for nameless seer and reflecting mist
new feature: map-event notifications (nameless seer and reflecting mist)
(hotfix 1) lab-compass import fallback, fixed outdated horizon orb tooltip
(hotfix 2) updated betrayal-info to 3.26 (not ruthless), added betrayal-info updater
(hotfix 3) updated stash-ninja to 3.26
act-tracker: added extended regex support, great white beast now optional
act-decoder: added advanced layouts to 9 zones in acts 1 and 2
act-tracker: added pobb.in support, added 3.26 pob support
act-tracker: updated the default guide with hints from cyclon's guide, updated/added some hint images
june 6, 2025
filterspoon feature removed for the time being
added wiki-links for talismans, added support for updated 0.2.1 map mods
new feature: <enchant finder> for anointing/instilling amulets
fixed amazon & ritualist ascendancy trees, sanctum planner couldn't be locked if act-decoder was enabled
act-decoder: added new advanced layouts for act 1
item-info: restructured settings, added new roll-range option, added customization for last column
sanctum/sekhema: poe2 compatibility, greatly improved scan accuracy, added relic management feature
act-tracker: rewrote many sections in poe2 guide, added toggle for optional loot/quests
item-info: added <quality and iron rune scaling> to more easily compare looted/crafted items to equipped ones
map-info: added support for updated chest map-mods
new feature: <act-decoder> for campaign layouts (moved from act-tracker)
act-decoder: initial test of more advanced layouts
statlas: updated some boss images, layout images are now monochrome for better visibility, added support for various maps
april 24, 2025
item-info: fixed maces and bucklers, improved affix detection
map-tracker: fixed rare issue when reviving during boss-fights, added afk detection
new feature: <statlas> for checking layouts, bosses, and stats right from the atlas
